name: Fladramon
description: Flamedramon is a bipedal creature with blue skin that looks like a grown version of Veemon . It wears armor on its face, chest, thighs, hands, and feet, It has a blade-like spike protruding from its mask and claws from its hands. The armor is covered with flame-like designs. The forehead spike and the armor's flame design are references to the Digi-Egg of Courage , with which it is intimately associated. It wears belts on its upper arms.
